items.question: Can I get a tax receipt?
items.answer: Yes! A receipt will be automatically sent to you by email after your donation. ConnectStar is in the process of obtaining non-profit status to enable tax deductibility.

items.question: Are my banking details secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use Stripe, the world's most secure payment platform. Your banking data is encrypted and we never store it on our servers.

items.question: Can I cancel my monthly donation?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your monthly donation at any time from your donor space or by contacting us directly. No obligation, no constraint.

items.question: Why does ConnectStar ask for donations if it's free?
items.answer: ConnectStar will always remain free because it's a divine mission, not a commercial one. Donations help cover infrastructure costs (servers, security) and develop new spiritual features without ever selling your data.

items.question: How can I help other than financially?
items.answer: You can pray for the mission, share ConnectStar in your community, join our beta-testing team, or contribute your skills (development, design, translation).

items.question: Where can I see how funds are used?
items.answer: We regularly publish transparency reports on our website and to our donors. Every euro is used with integrity to serve the Body of Christ.
